mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ListHead ( listCode, description, prompt1, prompt2, prompt3, prompt4, prompt5, prompt6, prompt7, prompt8, prompt9, prompt10, prompt11, prompt12, prompt13, prompt14, prompt15, prompt16, notes, businessId, createdBy, lastModifiedBy, createdByIP, lastModifiedByIP, status, createDate, updateDate ) VALUES ( #{listCode}, #{description}, #{prompt1}, #{prompt2}, #{prompt3}, #{prompt4}, #{prompt5}, #{prompt6}, #{prompt7}, #{prompt8}, #{prompt9}, #{prompt10}, #{prompt11}, #{prompt12}, #{prompt13}, #{prompt14}, #{prompt15}, #{prompt16}, #{notes}, #{businessId}, #{createdBy}, #{lastModifiedBy}, #{createdByIP}, #{lastModifiedByIP}, #{status}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ListHead SET listCode=#{listCode}, description=#{description}, prompt1=#{prompt1}, prompt2=#{prompt2}, prompt3=#{prompt3}, prompt4=#{prompt4}, prompt5=#{prompt5}, prompt6=#{prompt6}, prompt7=#{prompt7}, prompt8=#{prompt8}, prompt9=#{prompt9}, prompt10=#{prompt10}, prompt11=#{prompt11}, prompt12=#{prompt12}, prompt13=#{prompt13}, prompt14=#{prompt14}, prompt15=#{prompt15}, prompt16=#{prompt16}, notes=#{notes}, businessId=#{businessId}, createdBy=#{createdBy}, lastModifiedBy=#{lastModifiedBy}, createdByIP=#{createdByIP}, lastModifiedByIP=#{lastModifiedByIP}, status=#{status}, createDate=#{createDate}, updateDate=#{updateDate} WHERE listHeadId=#{listHeadId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DataList ( listCode, description, listValue1, listValue2, listValue3, listValue4, listValue5, listValue6, listValue7, listValue8, listValue9, listValue10, listValue11, listValue12, listValue13, listValue14, listValue15, listValue16, extraValue1, extraValue2, extraValue3, extraValue4, extraValue5, businessId, createdBy, lastModifiedBy, createdByIP, lastModifiedByIP, status, createDate, updateDate ) VALUES ( #{listCode}, #{description}, #{listValue1}, #{listValue2}, #{listValue3}, #{listValue4}, #{listValue5}, #{listValue6}, #{listValue7}, #{listValue8}, #{listValue9}, #{listValue10}, #{listValue11}, #{listValue12}, #{listValue13}, #{listValue14}, #{listValue15}, #{listValue16}, #{extraValue1}, #{extraValue2}, #{extraValue3}, #{extraValue4}, #{extraValue5}, #{businessId}, #{createdBy}, #{lastModifiedBy}, #{createdByIP}, #{lastModifiedByIP}, #{status}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE DataList SET listCode=#{listCode}, description=#{description}, listValue1=#{listValue1}, listValue2=#{listValue2}, listValue3=#{listValue3}, listValue4=#{listValue4}, listValue5=#{listValue5}, listValue6=#{listValue6}, listValue7=#{listValue7}, listValue8=#{listValue8}, listValue9=#{listValue9}, listValue10=#{listValue10}, listValue11=#{listValue11}, listValue12=#{listValue12}, listValue13=#{listValue13}, listValue14=#{listValue14}, listValue15=#{listValue15}, listValue16=#{listValue16}, extraValue1=#{extraValue1}, extraValue2=#{extraValue2}, extraValue3=#{extraValue3}, extraValue4=#{extraValue4}, extraValue5=#{extraValue5}, businessId=#{businessId}, createdBy=#{createdBy}, lastModifiedBy=#{lastModifiedBy}, createdByIP=#{createdByIP}, lastModifiedByIP=#{lastModifiedByIP}, status=#{status}, createDate=#{createDate}, updateDate=#{updateDate} WHERE listId=#{listId}
